link.title: Engineering a Real-Time Chat System with Socket.IO
link.description: This section details the implementation of the project's most complex feature: a full-stack, real-time chat system. The journey evolved from building a standard request-response web application to engineering a sophisticated, event-driven platform using WebSockets via the Socket.IO library. The design decisions made in previous refactors, such as the `isPublic` and `isVerified` flags, proved to be a crucial and secure foundation for this new layer of community interaction.
